bike.description: Enduro frame design, 6061 aluminum tubes, tapered/ovalized top tube, down tube & stays with replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: Gloss Black, Ocean Mist, Pearl White

components.description: Smash suspension fork with coil spring, 45mm travel
Alloy 36H black anodized rims with bruished brake tracks, heavy duty ATB hubs with nutted axles and 14G nickel-plated spokes
Shimano TX31 rear and TZ31top pull front
Forged alloy crank, 152mm, with 34/24T chainrings and protective outer rock-ring
ATB style, hi-impact resin, toe-clip attachable
Alloy linear pull type with full alloy short reach levers
ATB riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 580mm wide
Alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 300mm, with 31.8mm alloy clamp
